emission.notes: Market-driven emission model - block rewards determined by difficulty using logarithmic function. Rewards proportional to log2(Difficulty) with variable proportionality constant currently set at 221077819000000000. No fixed halving schedule - emissions respond to network hashrate and difficulty changes.

premine.details: 3 billion QUAI allocated at genesis across 7 categories with time-locked vesting. Remaining supply issued through PoW mining with market-driven difficulty-based rewards.

notes: 100% premine at genesis (3B QUAI), all with time-locked vesting schedules
Dual-token system: QUAI (utility, smart contracts) and QI (energy-backed stablecoin)
Market-driven emission model replaces fixed halving schedule
Total funding: $15M across 3 rounds: Seed 1 $8M (Polychain Capital, Mar 2022), Seed 2 $2M (Alumni Ventures, May 2022), Strategic $5M (Cogitent Ventures, Aug 2024)
Hierarchical structure: Prime, Region, and Zone chains for scalability
50,000+ TPS claimed throughput via merged-mined sharding
Approximately 70M QUAI (~2.3% of supply) from Testnet allocation to be burned
11 institutional investors total including Polychain, Cogitent, MH Ventures, Black Edge Capital, Ceras Ventures
